title: Working with Subnets
description: Subnets are composed of a discrete number of UIDs. The subnet validators and subnet miners are associated with these UIDs. Each UID in the subnet belongs to a unique hotkey which in turn is connected to a unique coldkey which was used during regisration. The Yuma Consensus runs on these UIDs. This section presents a few examples showing how to work with subnets.
